note:
Kiwi with many shits to give about many things.

My house will be found full of animals, interesting food, other peoples' kids, and stuff I should have done before I got distracted.

Carer, animal lover, gardener, computer fixer.

A keen interest in physics and other sciences, adult neurodiversity, animal welfare, human welfare (probably in that order if I'm really honest!), the rights of everyone to be themselves, the left side of politics, and brightening up the world in any way I can.
